TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler(object sender, AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: The object that raised the event.

summary.span: 代表使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式所實作的方法，這個方法用來處理使用者介面自動化提供者在焦點已變更時所引發的事件。

span.span: Represents the method implemented by the UI Automation client application to handle the event raised by a UI Automation provider when the focus has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用定義要處理的用戶端會呼叫的方法委派[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]焦點變更事件。Use an delegate to define the method that is called by a client to handle [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] focus-changed events. 由`sender`可能沒有任何快取屬性或模式，根據應用程式時，此事件的訂閱是否作用中。The represented by `sender` might not have any cached properties or patterns, depending on whether the application subscribed to this event while a was active. ## Examples 下列範例會實作來處理焦點變更事件的委派。The following example implements a delegate to handle focus-changed events. [!code-csharp[UIAFocusTracker_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/CSharp/FocusTracker.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIAFocusTracker_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/VisualBasic/FocusTracker.vb#106)]
